thread.title: James Corden brutally tears apart that Britney Spears biopic
thread.title_full: James Corden brutally tears apart that Britney Spears biopic

author: Gianluca Mezzofiore
title: James Corden brutally tears apart that Britney Spears biopic
text:
James Corden brutally tears apart that Britney Spears biopic 0 2017-02-23 10:07:02 UTC 
The internet called and James Corden responded. 
The topic: that Britney Spears biopic, Britney Ever After , that left excruciated viewers in shock and despair. 
During The Late Late Show, Corden ripped apart the TV movie sharing many concerns that Britney fans had poured on Twitter — from the ridiculous casting, cheesy dialogue and atrocious costume design. 
“The role of Britney Spears was played by none other than the Australian actress Natasha Bassett," he said. “She’s the perfect person for a biopic ― if the biopic was about Tiffany Trump.”
